article_title: Wrongest Man in Politics to Now Be Wrongest Man on Twitter
article_text:
The wrongest man in politics has joined us proles on the 140-character field. At least he wasn’t condescending about it:

At long last, I'm on Twitter: "If the mountaine will not come to Mahomet, Mahomet will goe to the mountaine." — Bill Kristol (@BillKristol) October 13, 2014

Rumors that Mohamet was nowhere near the mountain on election day went unconfirmed at press time.

Also related: How Does He Keep Getting a Platform? Bill Kristol’s History of Terrible Predictions and Bad Advice.

[Image via screengrab]

——

>> Follow Evan McMurry (@evanmcmurry) on Twitter
